snippet: A decorated combat veteran and a military assistant to Robert S. McNamara, General Berry’s most notable role was overseeing the transition to coeducation at West Point.
abstract: Lt Gen Sidney B Berry, decorated combat veteran who ushered women into West Point as superintendent of the United States Military Academy in the 1970s and confronted a grievous cheating scandal there, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: A decorated combat veteran and a military assistant to Robert S. McNamara, General Berry’s most notable role was overseeing the transition to coeducation at West Point.

headline.main: Lt. Gen. Sidney Berry, West Point Chief, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: Lt. Gen. Sidney Berry, 87, West Point Chief, Is Dead

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
